Row.Text: Poor Straw Poll Results
The people don't seem too happy with the job you've been doing lately. It might cause some major setbacks for World Marshal's plans if you don't do something about it.[NEWLINE]
Fuck it. Only the actual ballots count.
Bribe some officials.
Call in some favors.

Your bribe worked very effectively.
Your political buddies didn't like it too much, but they were more than willing to say some good words on your behalf.
Johnson's New Reception Area

That little bastard Johnson has brought in some {1_OtherCivAdjective} Cherry Blossoms and planted them in the reception area of your main office. Cherry blossoms make you sick to your stomach, and you're strongly resisting the urge to break several of his ribs. You're an American organization, dammit, and getting rid of this shit is going to reinforce that![NEWLINE]
Whatever, let it stay.
"Strongly resisting," my ass!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a Declaration of Friendship with {1_CivName}[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]{1_Num} turn(s) of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
You're just going to have to take the long way around to avoid that reception room from now on. At least {1_LeaderName} is happy with it; perhaps you could use that to your advantage.

You kicked Johnson out of World Marshal for this blunder -- and that's not a figure of speech. It's gonna take a little bit to remove every trace of those pussy-ass cherry blossoms, but it'll be worth it.
Standing Here, He Realizes...

The fearsome warrior born from both the child soldier training of George Sears and the machinations of the Patriots' S3 Program has targeted you and the rest of World Marshal. He's declaring a one-man war on you and your men. You've never held such feelings of both contempt and respect for one man. But he's got to be taken down. Perhaps you can convince him to see things your way...[NEWLINE]
Ready or not, Jack, here we go!
